articles.description: The public outcry – and outpouring of affection – after the mural was defaced shows just how deeply rooted a piece of public art can become in a community
articles.content: This week, the wall of Manchesters 75 Port Street, a canvas for street artists, cycled through three different designs in the space of one day the last a plain black background, with no trace of what… [+6654 chars]
